import React from 'react'; import { minutesToDuration } from '../utils/duration/index'; export default function Duration(props){ const { timeModeMaster, setTimeModeMaster, isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning } = props; const { focusCurrent, breakCurrent } = timeModeMaster return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focusCurrent)}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current break session duration */} Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakCurrent)}
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/} {/* TODO: Implement increasing break duration and disable during a focus or break session*/}
); }
